Ankush Laxman Pol wrote:
> Hi All,
>   I have functioanlity which picks xml file and pass it through TIBCO 
> processing which will then insert data from xml to oracle database.
>   
>   Now requirement is to process it automatically,means to pick up all 
> xmls and run them through TIBCO processing.
>   
>   Suggestion is to test them through Junit so that we can capture Test 
> Result.
>   
>   As my number of xmls will be changing how can I write single test case 
> which can take different file each time and process it and accumulate 
> results and give it in JUNITREPORT format.
>   
>   As per my analysis , I need to generate (through some code generator 
> logic) different methods for every file.
>   
>   Please suggest. :)

Search the web for "JUnit parameterized test case", which should tell 
you about a pattern that allows you to run the same test for many 
different inputs and count each as a test in your test report.
